name: OceanuX Deluxe - Underwater Match 3
description:
SunRay Games presents a new match-3 puzzle game!

Step onboard the big submarine and wander the deep ocean. Dive and collect treasures to destroy matching lines of three or more objects. Acquire power-ups like Bomb and Lightning to improve your score. As a bonus, there's a brave captain to help you navigate the game. Explore the depths of the ocean in OceanuX, an underwater match-3 game.

Features

Magnificent underwater sea world!
Play 200+ levels filled with challenging match-3 puzzles!
Cool power-ups!
The beautiful fish world in the background!
Connect multiple objects to create explosions!
Fight pirates!
Challenge your Facebook friends!
